typedef struct _NT_TIB {

} NT_TIB;
typedef NT_TIB *PNT_TIB;

mov eax, dword ptr fs:[00000000h] ; retrieve the head
push eax ; save the old head
lea eax, [ebp-10h]

mov dword ptr fs:[00000000h], ecx ; restore the old head
